data.enText: powerful and very dangerous rays that are sent out from radioactive substances
high levels/doses of radiation that damage cells
data.chText: 损害细胞的高强度辐射

data.enText: the link between exposure to radiation and childhood cancer
data.chText: 接触辐射与儿童恶性肿瘤之间的联系

data.enText: a radiation leak from a nuclear power station
heat, energy, etc. that is sent out in the form of rays
the treatment of cancer and other diseases using radiation

simple_means.memory_skill: radiat(e) 辐射 + -ion 行为,状态

tr: (medicine) the treatment of disease (especially cancer) by exposure to a radioactive substance
the act of spreading outward from a central source
a radial arrangement of nerve fibers connecting different parts of the brain
the spread of a group of organisms into new habitats
energy that is radiated or transmitted in the form of rays or waves or particles
the spontaneous emission of a stream of particles or electromagnetic rays in nuclear decay
syndrome resulting from exposure to ionizing radiation (e.g., exposure to radioactive chemicals or to nuclear explosions)
low doses cause diarrhea and nausea and vomiting and sometimes loss of hair
greater exposure can cause sterility and cataracts and some forms of cancer and other diseases
severe exposure can cause death within hours

example.ex: They suffer from health problems and fear the long term effects of radiation...
example.tran: 他们遭受着健康问题的困扰并且害怕辐射的长期影响。

example.ex: If the cancer returns, radiation therapy is successful in 90 per cent of cases.
example.tran: 如果癌症复发，放射性疗法有90%的治愈率。

gramarinfo.label: also N in pl, oft N n

value.def: Radiation consists of very small particles of a radioactive substance. Large amounts of radiation can cause illness and death.

example.ex: The satellite will study energy radiation from stars.
example.tran: 这颗人造卫星将用来研究恒星的能量辐射。

gramarinfo.label: also N in pl, usu with supp

value.def: Radiation is energy, especially heat, that comes from a particular source.
value.tran: 辐射能;放射能;（尤指）热能

trans: 辐射散热；辐射；热辐射；熱輻射；辐射换热
霍金辐射；霍金輻射；霍金輻射；hawking辐射
太阳辐射；辐射；太阳辐射能；太阳辐射量；日光照射
辐射防护；防辐射；輻射防護；放射防护；放射线防护
